name: Vanguard
0:
”Alexa, ask vanguard sensor turn on blue light”
”Alexa, tell me temperature from vanguard sensor”
”Alexa, turn off light using vanguard sensor”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: vanguard sensor
des:
prerequisites: vanguard device, sensor (thunderboard), cloud software release by usi, and an account for account linking.

skill core functionality: 
1. let alexa response vanguard sensor data.(temperature/humidity/battery level/UV/air pressure/ambient light/sound level/...)
2. make the sensor light in (blue/red/green/teal/yellow/...) color.
